<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> and <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3335>potter's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> I will cause you to <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words.<s%>
Then I <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H3335>potter's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H6213>worked<s%> a <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H70>wheels.<s%>

And the <S%H3627>vessel<s%> that he <S%H6213>made<s%> of <S%H2563>clay<s%> was <S%H7843>marred<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3335>potter:<s%> so he <S%H6213>made<s%> it <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> as <S%H5869>seemed<s%> <S%H3474>good<s%> to the <S%H3335>potter<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> it.
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> I <S%H6213>do<s%> with you as <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3335>potter?<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> as the <S%H2563>clay<s%> is in the <S%H3335>potter's<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> are you in my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

At what <S%H7281>instant<s%> I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> a <S%H1471>nation,<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> a <S%H4467>kingdom,<s%> to <S%H5428>pluck<s%> up, and to <S%H5422>pull<s%> down, and to <S%H6>destroy<s%> it;

If that <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I have <S%H1696>pronounced,<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H7451>evil,<s%> I will <S%H5162>repent<s%> of the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that I <S%H2803>thought<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> to them.

And at what <S%H7281>instant<s%> I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> a <S%H1471>nation,<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> a <S%H4467>kingdom,<s%> to <S%H1129>build<s%> and to <S%H5193>plant<s%> it;

If it <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight,<s%> that it <S%H8085>obey<s%> not my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> then I will <S%H5162>repent<s%> of the <S%H2896>good,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H559>said<s%> I would <S%H3190>benefit<s%> them.

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H4994>go<s%> to, <S%H559>speak<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> I <S%H3335>frame<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, and <S%H2803>devise<s%> a <S%H4284>device<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you: <S%H7725>return<s%> you <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and make your <S%H1870>ways<s%> and your <S%H4611>doings<s%> <S%H3190>good.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> There is no <S%H2976>hope:<s%> but we will <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> our own <S%H4284>devices,<s%> and we will <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H7592>Ask<s%> you <S%H4994>now<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H428>such<s%> things: the <S%H1330>virgin<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H8186>horrible<s%> thing.

Will a man <S%H5800>leave<s%> the <S%H7950>snow<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> which <S%H935>comes<s%> from the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of the <S%H7704>field?<s%> or shall the <S%H7119>cold<s%> <S%H5140>flowing<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> that come from <S%H2114>another<s%> place be <S%H5428>forsaken?<s%>

<S%H3588>Because<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> has <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> me, they have <S%H6999>burned<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H7723>vanity,<s%> and they have caused them to <S%H3782>stumble<s%> in their <S%H1870>ways<s%> from the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H7635>paths,<s%> to <S%H1980>walk<s%> in <S%H5410>paths,<s%> in a <S%H1870>way<s%> not <S%H5549>cast<s%> up;

To <S%H7760>make<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8047>desolate,<s%> and a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H8292>hissing;<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> one that <S%H5674>passes<s%> <S%H5921>thereby<s%> shall be <S%H8074>astonished,<s%> and <S%H5110>wag<s%> his <S%H7218>head.<s%>

I will <S%H6327>scatter<s%> them as with an <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H341>enemy;<s%> I will <S%H7200>show<s%> them the <S%H6203>back,<s%> and not the <S%H6440>face,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> they, Come <S%H3212><s%>and let us <S%H2803>devise<s%> <S%H4284>devices<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah;<s%> for the <S%H8451>law<s%> shall not <S%H6>perish<s%> from the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> nor <S%H6098>counsel<s%> from the <S%H2450>wise,<s%> nor the <S%H1697>word<s%> from the <S%H5030>prophet.<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H5221>smite<s%> him with the <S%H3956>tongue,<s%> and let us not give <S%H7181>heed<s%> to <S%H3605>any<s%> of his <S%H1697>words.<s%>
Give <S%H7181>heed<s%> to me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of them that <S%H3401>contend<s%> with me.

Shall <S%H7451>evil<s%> be <S%H7999>recompensed<s%> for <S%H2896>good?<s%> for they have <S%H3738>dig<s%> a <S%H7745>pit<s%> for my <S%H5315>soul.<s%> <S%H2142>Remember<s%> that I <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> for them, and to <S%H7725>turn<s%> away your <S%H2534>wrath<s%> from them.

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H5414>deliver<s%> up their <S%H1121>children<s%> to the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and <S%H5064>pour<s%> out their blood by the <S%H3027>force<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and let their <S%H802>wives<s%> be <S%H7909>bereaved<s%> of their children, and be <S%H490>widows;<s%> and let their <S%H582>men<s%> be <S%H2026>put<s%> to <S%H4194>death;<s%> let their <S%H970>young<s%> men be <S%H5221>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

Let a <S%H2201>cry<s%> be <S%H8085>heard<s%> from their <S%H1004>houses,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H1416>troop<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> on them: for they have <S%H3738>dig<s%> a <S%H7743>pit<s%> <S%H7882><s%> to <S%H3920>take<s%> me, and <S%H2934>hid<s%> <S%H6341>snares<s%> for my <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

Yet, <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6098>counsel<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me to <S%H4191>slay<s%> me: <S%H3722>forgive<s%> not their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H4229>blot<s%> out their <S%H2403>sin<s%> from your <S%H6440>sight,<s%> but let them be <S%H3782>overthrown<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; <S%H6213>deal<s%> thus with them in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of your <S%H639>anger.<s%>
